message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $18,000. This product is worth a significant investment, and I'm confident it will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16,000 for the product.
